resources.title: Module 1: Introduction to Large Language Models
resources.description: Comprehensive introduction to LLMs covering architecture, capabilities, and applications in network operations.

resources.title: Module 2: Privacy-Aware AI Deployment
resources.description: Deep dive into privacy considerations, data protection, and institutional autonomy in AI deployment.

resources.title: Module 3: RAG Pipelines for Network Documentation
resources.description: Practical guide to building Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipelines for network documentation and troubleshooting.

resources.title: Module 4: AI Agentic Workflows
resources.description: Advanced module on building AI agents for automated network operations tasks.

resources.title: Module 5: Infrastructure Integration
resources.description: Guide to integrating locally-hosted LLMs with existing network infrastructure and monitoring systems.

resources.title: Initial Needs Assessment Report
resources.description: Survey results and analysis of AI adoption challenges across IDREN member institutions.

resources.title: NetOps with AI: Policy Insights for IDREN
resources.description: Comprehensive whitepaper on AI adoption policies and recommendations for network operations in educational institutions.
